Whenever you cast a spell, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast until end of turn.
When this creature enters, discard your hand. For each card discarded this way, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
